title: Advice to a son; or Directions for your better conduct through the various and most important encounters of this life. Vnder these generall heads I. Studies &c. II. Love and marriage. III. Travell. IV. Government. V. Religion. Conclusion.
author: Osborne, Francis, 1593-1659.
publisher: Printed by Hen: Hall printer to the University, for Thomas Robinson,
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: "October. 18. 1655."; the second 6 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
